Question.Subject: Why doesn't formspring ever work?
Question.Content:
The view "more" questions never works. When you click on following a red note is there stating that its having difficultly. And sometimes formspring itself has an error when trying to access the site!
What is the deal? Everyones complaining. @ Ching Chong: Have some maturity.
Question.ChosenAnswer: It is a fairly new website, and the increase in traffic is probably hitting their servers pretty hard. I'm sure eventually they will get the issues ironed out.

Answer.Content: stop sexting on formspring. i kno u want to kno things like boob sizes but u can just ask them 2 ther face
It is a fairly new website, and the increase in traffic is probably hitting their servers pretty hard. I'm sure eventually they will get the issues ironed out.
